body_html: I'm afraid I still don't have a good idea what you're suggesting. I don't understand what you mean by protocol, since you seem to be rejecting the use of the master.proto and worker.proto interfaces, which are the only way TF processes intercommunicate.
body_text: I'm afraid I still don't have a good idea what you're suggesting.   I don't understand what you mean by protocol, since you seem to be rejecting the use of the master.proto and worker.proto interfaces, which are the only way TF processes intercommunicate.
body: I'm afraid I still don't have a good idea what you're suggesting.   I don't understand what you mean by protocol, since you seem to be rejecting the use of the master.proto and worker.proto interfaces, which are the only way TF processes intercommunicate.
